name: Addison Kobe
description: We have 9 kids and the last 2 are twins. We got a pair of these for the twins so they could help out their brothers shoveling our heavy northern Wisconsin snow. They love it!!!The shovels are well made and sturdy.

name: Mathias Henry
description: This is an excellent shovel. It’s a great size and weight for our 4 year old, and honestly we borrow it for certain shoveling jobs because it works better than many adult shovels. It’s very sturdy.

name: Robert C. Hughes
description: We have 9 kids and the last 2 are twins. We got a pair of these for the twins so they could help out their brothers shoveling our heavy northern Wisconsin snow. They love it!!!The shovels are well made and sturdy.

name: Mary R. Phillips
description: We purchased 2 of these shovels and they have been great. Light enough for our three year old and sturdy enough for our seven year old. Great product for a great price. I see these shovels ladting for years.

name: Claudine R. Watkins
description: I don’t usually get Marvel Legends, but this one is an exception. It looks like he jumped straight outta the movie, he has basically any accesories you’d really want from a spot fig, and he’s only 25 dollars.

name: Chasity M. Free
description: Greatest movie ever made and this figure is solid. With how much he talks with his hands I wish he came with more of them. A foam sheet cut into some circles really pulled him together for me.

name: Kevin C. Roybal
description: I enjoy how easy it is to move his joints, as opposed to some of my other Marvel Legends figures who have stiff joints.
